// The complete list of tritangents plane the modular curve X_0(54) 

//  This is a genus 4 non-hyperelliptic curve and we work with the following canonical model of the curve 

f_{1} = x^{2}z - xz^{2} - y^{3} + y^{2}w -3yw^{2} + z^{3} + 3w^{3} 
f_{2} = xw - yz + zw 

// all tritangent planes are defined over the degree 36 Galois extension defined by 

f = u^{36} - 24u^{35} + 408u^{34} - 3372u^{33} + 22056u^{32} - 127776u^{31} + 630786u^{30} - 2714424u^{29} + 11261496u^{28} - 41046764u^{27} +
131733144u^{26} - 408414384u^{25} + 1150083423u^{24} - 2814636528u^{23} + 6374836368u^{22} - 13214216088u^{21} + 23592829968u^{20} - 36895248864u^{19}
+ 51352475964u^{18} - 58328930160u^{17} + 42803579664u^{16} + 3616822728u^{15} - 69219558864u^{14} + 126403035264u^{13} - 153084561489u^{12} + 151586318088u^{11}
- 131113127592u^{10} + 78540995524u^9 + 18513274440u^8 - 121585972992u^7 + 155356552290u^6 - 110860906584u^5 + 57084024120u^4 - 38472387036u^3 + 36135508152u^2
- 21483956688u + 5029788241

// all our planes have equations of the form : x = a_{1}y + a_{2}z + a_{3}
// we state the  tritangents in their Galois orbits, for each orbit we give the minimal polynomial f of a_{1} and expressions for a_{2} amd a_{3} in terms of a_{1} = u, where u is any root of f 
// we also state the minimal polynomials f_{2},f_{3} of a_{2}, a_{3} 
// relations for all orbits of size at most 18 were computed using lattices, but the degree 36 orbit was computed by factorising the mnimial polynomials of a_{2} and a_{3} over K 
// all minimal polynomials were computed using lattice reduction 


f1 :=  u^3 + 16;
a[1] := u ; 
a[2] := 2 ;
a[3] := 0 ;
--------------------------------------------------------

f1 := u^3 + 4 ;
a[1] := u;
a[2] := 2; 
a[3] := 0 ;

-------------------------------------------------------
f1 := u^6 - 34*u^3 + 1 ;
a[1] := u ;
a[2] := -1 ;
a[3] := -3u ;
s3 :=  u^6 + 918*u^3 + 729 ;

--------------------------------------------------------

f1 := u^9 - 6u^8 - 33u^7 + 12u^6 + 159u^5 + 42u^4 - 303u^3 - 96u^2 + 336u- 368;
a[1] := u ;
a[2] := 1/122088*(582*u^8 - 4171*u^7 - 13492*u^6 + 15942*u^5 + 58678*u^4 - 
    16883*u^3 - 81192*u^2 - 22192*u + 72224) ;
a[3] := 1/122088*(582*u^8 - 4171*u^7 - 13492*u^6 + 15942*u^5 + 58678*u^4 - 
    16883*u^3 - 81192*u^2 - 22192*u - 171952);
    
 s2 := u^9 + 96*u^8 - 393*u^7 + 2394*u^6 - 5829*u^5 + 13092*u^4 - 16815*u^3 + 14730*u^2- 7332*u + 1528 ;
 s3 := u^9 + 114*u^8 + 1287*u^7 + 8316*u^6 + 34911*u^5 + 99954*u^4 + 195129*u^3 + 248832*u^2 + 186624*u + 62208 ;
 
--------------------------------------------------------
f1 := u^9 - 6u^8 + 39u^7 - 96u^6 + 231u^5 - 498u^4 + 705u^3 - 1068u^2 + 768u - 764 ;
a[1] := u ;
a[2] := 1/27472884*(-9147*u^8 + 39967*u^7 - 166418*u^6 - 250242*u^5 + 
    2759129*u^4 - 9620461*u^3 + 19809024*u^2 - 37745252*u + 44613460);
a[3] := 1/27472884*(-9147*u^8 + 39967*u^7 - 166418*u^6 - 250242*u^5 + 
    2759129*u^4 - 9620461*u^3 + 19809024*u^2 - 37745252*u - 10332308) ;
    
 s2 := u^9 - 24*u^8 + 231*u^7 - 30*u^6 + 195*u^5 - 348*u^4 + 1449*u^3 - 1158*u^2 + 636*u + 184 ;
 s3 := u^9 - 6*u^8 - 9*u^7 + 1188*u^6 + 10503*u^5 + 41634*u^4 + 93393*u^3 + 124416*u^2 + 93312*u + 31104 

--------------------------------------------------------

        6402*u^11 + 15594*u^10 - 15838*u^9 + 26709*u^8 - 33978*u^7 + 33585*u^6 +

    a[3] := 1/5906415005533968874221744*(-49704949515676066445*u^17 - 
    263089380367087944527*u^16 - 3264763180320918744461*u^15 +

f1 := u^36 - 24*u^35 + 408*u^34 - 3372*u^33 + 22056*u^32 - 127776*u^31 + 630786*u^30 - 2714424*u^29 + 11261496*u^28

s2 := u^18 - 342*u^17 - 2727*u^16 - 31080*u^15 - 231588*u^14 - 722304*u^13 -

s3 := u^36 - 648*u^35 + 427464*u^34 + 5079780*u^33 - 1714392*u^32 + 1011998448*u^31 + 7488465714*u^30 - 90765074232*u^29 - 188915293656*u^28
